abstract: Apple, the third-largest personal computer maker in the United States, continued to benefit from the significant market share gains of its Macintosh computer line.
snippet: Apple, the third-largest personal computer maker in the United States, continued to benefit from the significant market share gains of its Macintosh computer line.
lead_paragraph: Apple, which has become the third-largest personal computer maker in the United States, benefited from the significant market share gains of its Macintosh computer line as well as its continued domination of the digital music player business, in its third quarter.

headline.main: After Strong Quarter, Apple Signals Changes in Its Prices
headline.print_headline: After Strong Quarter, Apple Signals Changes in Its Prices
